import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import "../styles/chocolat.css"; export default function Chocolat() { const [chocolats, setchocolats] = useState([]); const [filtre, setFiltre] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { fetch('data.json') .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => setchocolats(data.chocolats)) .catch(error => console.log(error)) }, []); const chocolatsFiltres = chocolats.filter((v) => v.title.toLowerCase().includes(filtre.toLowerCase()) ); return (

Filtre
